channel.title: [Pi] Adding Commands like ::jail, ::rules and ::vote with ::redeem
channel.description:
I want to be able to add a command like ::vote that only used every 24 hours, and after useing it u can do ::redeem and get a reward for voting..
also, how can i add a command for everyone that is ::rules and shows the rules or ::commands and shows commands? please help!
